text: Rio Grande Hospital is a critical access hospital in Del Norte, Colorado, in Rio Grande County. The hospital has 17 beds. In addition to the main hospital buildings in Del Norte, the hospital also operates clinics in Creede, South Fork, and Monte Vista. The hospital is a Level IV trauma center. ==History== The hospital was established in 1996 by the Valley Citizens’ Foundation for Healthcare, Inc., a community non-profit organization, succeeding an earlier hospital organization that closed in 1993. ==References== ==External links== *Hospital website Category:Hospitals in Colorado Category:Buildings and structures in Rio Grande County, Colorado Category:Hospitals established in 1996 Category:1996 establishments in Colorado
title: Rio Grande Hospital
